entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 1:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: ESE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
